data.title: My Portfolio (Self-Study)
data.description: This is my personal portfolio, this is a self-study developed project!

data.title: Sweet Bakery (Project-CS602)
data.description: It is an online bakery store for the customer to search the products and add the products to the cart and check out. Administrator can login into the application to add the product, edit and delete the product as well as edit or delete the orders of the customer.

data.title: My Portfolio (Project-CS601)
data.description: A portfolio project that emphasis on front end. It is a responsive website and uses grid, flex and different CSS properties to do my layouts. ES6 is also used in the javascripts and HTML pages. Data is stored in the JSON files.

data.title: My Food Manager (Project-CS683)
data.description: An Android application that allows users to manage their food, this app can keep track the inventory of the foods, the expiration date of the foods and the cost of the foods and provides notifications when the food items are going to expire.

data.title: Vehicle Builder (Project-CS665)
data.description: It is an application that allows the user to add any combination of vehicle options to the vehicle, it will return the total price of the vehicle to the user.

data.title: My Diet Hub(Team Project-CS673)
data.description: It is an application that help the user to calculate their daily calorie counts, user can do the CRUD operations for their meals after login into the application. An admin can manage the user includes query, update and delete the user.

data.title: Python Projects
data.description: Games Stopwatch, Pong, Memory, Blackjack and Spaceship are written in Python using CodeSkulptor

data.title: Money Management (Self-Study)
data.description: It is a money management MERN application that will do the credit card statement analysis for the user to give the user an idea how are the money spent by categories or by stores.This is a self-study developed project and use Netlify to deploy the front end, don't deploy the back end as it needs cost of money
